set(SUBPRJ "CBOR")
message(STATUS "---------------------------")
message(STATUS "Current : ${SUBPRJ}")
if(${ENABLE_LCOV})
    message(STATUS "Enable Lcov in ${SUBPRJ}")
    include(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/test/CodeCoverage.cmake)
    APPEND_COVERAGE_COMPILER_FLAGS()
    set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG} -fprofile-arcs -ftest-coverage")
endif()
aux_source_directory(src SRCLISTS)
add_library(${SUBPRJ} ${SRCLISTS})
target_include_directories(${SUBPRJ} PUBLIC inc)
